abstract: <jats:title>Abstract</jats:title><jats:p>The purpose of this paper is to derive an integral representation of the Drazin inverse of an element of a Banach algebra in a more general situation than previously obtained by the second author, and to give an application to the Moore–Penrose inverse in a $C^*$-algebra.</jats:p><jats:p>AMS 2000 <jats:italic>Mathematics subject classification:</jats:italic>Primary 46H05; 46L05</jats:p>
container-title: Proceedings of the Edinburgh Mathematical Society
short-container-title: Proceedings of the Edinburgh Mathematical Society
title: ON INTEGRAL REPRESENTATIONS OF THE DRAZIN INVERSE IN BANACH ALGEBRAS
